text.name: info1
text.text: The Harbour Master 64 community recently announced the development of a native PC port of the game Star Fox 64 (Lylat Wars), called Starship. The game was released in 1997 on Nintendo 64.

text.name: info1
text.text: A comunidade Harbour Master 64 anunciou recentemente o desenvolvimento de uma versão nativa para PC do jogo Star Fox 64 (Lylat Wars), chamada Starship. O jogo foi lançado em 1997 para o Nintendo 64.

text.name: info1
text.text: The Harbour Master 64 community recently announced the development of a native PC port of the game Star Fox 64 (Lylat Wars), called Starship. The game was released in 1997 on Nintendo 64.

text.name: info1
text.text: La comunidad Harbour Master 64 ha anunciado recientemente el desarrollo de una versión nativa para PC del juego Star Fox 64 (Lylat Wars), bautizada como Starship. El juego salió a la venta en 1997 para Nintendo 64.

text.name: info1
text.text: La communauté Harbour Master 64 a récemment annoncé le développement d’un portage PC natif du jeu Star Fox 64 (Lylat Wars), baptisé Starship. Le jeu était sorti en 1997 sur Nintendo 64.

text.name: info1
text.text: Die Harbour Master 64 Community hat kürzlich die Entwicklung einer nativen PC-Portierung des Spiels Star Fox 64 (Lylat Wars) namens Starship angekündigt. Das Spiel erschien 1997 für Nintendo 64.
